王治强 教授，博士生导师

电话：86-10-62782295

Email：wangzhiqiang@mail.tsinghua.edu.cn

教育背景

1982.9-1986.7 吉林大学化学系 无机化学 理学学士学位

1986.9-1989.7 吉林大学理论化学研究所物理化学 理学硕士学位

1994.9-1997.7 吉林大学化学系 高分子化学与物理 理学博士学位（导师： 沈家骢院士）

工作履历

2000.10-2001.3 吉林大学化学系 教授

2001.3-2003.3 北京化工大学 教授、博士生导师

2003.4- 清华大学化学系 教授、博士生导师

学术成果

代表论文：

2011年

A pH-Responsive Superamphiphile Based on Dynamic Covalent Bonds. Chao Wang, Guangtong Wang, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang. Chem. Eur. J., 2011, 17, 3322 – 3325.

2010年

An Enzyme-Responsive Polymeric Superamphiphile Chao Wang, Qishui Chen, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang Angew. Chem. Int. Ed., 2010, 49, 8612-8615.

Water-soluble supramolecular polymerization driven by multiple host-stabilized charge-transfer interactions Yiliu Liu, Ying Yu, Jian Gao, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang Angew. Chem. Int. Ed., 2010, 49, 6576-6579.

Oxidation-responsive micelles based on a selenium-containing polymeric superamphiphile Peng Han, Ning Ma, Huifeng Ren, Huaping Xu, Zhibo Li, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang. Langmuir, 2010, 26, 14414-14418.

Unconventional Layer-by-Layer assembly of graphene multilayer films for enzyme-based glucose and maltose biosensing. Guanghong Zeng, Yibo Xing, Jian Gao, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang. Langmuir, 2010, 26, 15022-15026.

Study on intercalations between double-Stranded DNA and pyrene by single-molecule force spectroscopy: toward the detection of mismatch in DNA. Zhenhua Jiang, Yiheng Zhang, Ying Yu, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang, Xinrui Duan, and Shu Wang. Langmuir, 2010, 26, 13773-13777.

Superamphiphiles based on charge transfer complex: controllable hierarchical self-assembly of nanoribbons.Chao Wang, Yinsheng Guo, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang.Langmuir, 2010, 26, 14509-14511.

2009年

Metal−ligand coordination-induced self-assembly of bolaamphiphiles bearing bipyrimidine. Bo Song, Guanglu Wu, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang, Mario Smet, and Wim Dehaen. Langmuir, 2009, 25, 13306-13310.

Single-molecule study on intermolecular interaction between C60 and porphyrin derivatives: toward understanding how strong the multivalency is. Yiheng Zhang, Ying Yu, Zhenhua Jiang, Huaping Xu, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang, Masafumi Oda, Tomoya Ishizuka, Donglin Jiang, Lifeng Chi, and Harald Fuchs. Langmuir, 2009,25, 6627-6632.

Facile reversible UV-controlled and fast transition from emulsion to gel by using a photo-responsive polymer with malachite green group. Yugui Jiang, Pengbo Wan, Huaping Xu, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang, and Mario Smet. Langmuir, 2009, 25, 10134-10138.

Self-organization of a polymerizable bolaamphiphile bearing a diacetylene group and L-aspartic acid group.Shouchun Yin, Chao Wang, Bo Song, Senlin Chen, and Zhiqiang Wang.Langmuir, 2009, 25, 8968-8973.

Mimicking biological structured surfaces by phase separation micromolding.Jian Gao, Yiliu Liu, Huaping Xu, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang.Langmuir, 2009, 25, 4365-4369.

Poly(acrylic acid)-bearing photoreactive azido groups for stabilizing multilayer films.Guanglu Wu, Feng Shi, Zhiqiang Wang, Zan Liu, and Xi Zhang.Langmuir, 2009, 25, 2949–2955.

分子间相互作用力的直接测量. 张义恒，王治强，张希. 高分子学报，2009, 10, 973-979.

2008年

Controlled self-assembly manipulated by charge transfer interaction: from tubes to vesicles.Chao Wang, Shouchun Yin, Senlin Chen, Huaping Xu, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang .Angew. Chem. Int. Ed., 2008, 47, 9049-9052.

Tuning surface wettability through photocontrolled reversible molecular shuttle.Pengbo Wan, Yugui Jiang, Yapei Wang, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang.Chem. Commun., 2008, 44, 5710-5712.

Light- controlled single-walled carbon nanotube dispersions in aqueous solution.Senlin Chen, Yugui Jiang, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang, Liming Dai, and Mario Smet.Langmuir, 2008, 24, 9233-9236.

Force spectroscopy of polymers: studying on inteamolecular and intermolecular interactions in single molecular level.Xi Zhang, Chuanjun Liu, and Zhiqiang Wang.Polymer, 2008, 49, 3353-3361.

Self-assembled monolayers of a malachite green derivative: surfaces with pH- and UV-responsive wetting properties.Yugui Jiang, Pengbo Wan, Mario Smet, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang.Adv. Mater., 2008, 20, 1972-1977.

Superhydrophobic surfaces: from structural control to functional application.Xi Zhang, Feng Shi, Jia Niu, Yugui Jiang, and Zhiqiang Wang.J. Mater. Chem., 2008, 18, 621-633.

Interfacial self-organization of bolaamphiphiles bearing mesogenic groups: relationships between the molecular structures and their self-organized morphologies.Bo Song, Guanqing Liu, Rui Xu, Shouchun Yin, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang. Langmuir, 2008, 24, 3734-3739.

Self-organization of bolaamphiphile bearing biphenyl mesogen and aspartic-acid headgroups. Senlin Chen, Bo Song, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang. J. Phys. Chem. C, 2008, 112, 3308-3313.

Interaction between dendrons directly studied by single-molecule force spectroscopy. Weiqing Shi, Yiheng Zhang, Chuanjun Liu, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang. Langmuir, 2008, 24, 1318-1323.

2007年

Combining hydrogen-bonding complexation in solution and hydrogen-bonding-directed layer-by-layer assembly for the controlled loading of a small organic molecule into multilayer films. Guanghong Zeng, Jian Gao, Senlin Chen, Huan Chen, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang .Langmuir, 2007, 23, 11631-11636.

Towards understanding why a superhydrophobic coating is needed by water striders. Feng Shi, Jia Niu, Jianlin Liu, Fang Liu, Zhiqiang Wang, Xiqiao Feng and Xi Zhang. Adv. Mater., 2007, 19, 2257-2261.

Intercalation interactions between dsDNA and acridine studied by single molecule force spectroscopy.Chuanjun Liu, Zhenhua Jiang, Yiheng Zhang, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang, Fude Feng .and Shu Wang.Langmuir, 2007, 23, 9140-9142.

Azobenzene-containing supramolecular side-chain polymer films for laser-induced surface relief gratings.Jian Gao, Yaning He, Fang Liu, Xi Zhang, Zhiqiang Wang and Xiaogong Wang.Chem. Mater., 2007, 19, 3877 -3881.

Hydrogen bonded layer-by-layer assembly of poly(2-vinylpyridine) and poly(acrylic acid): Influence of molecular weight on the formation of microporous film by post-base treatment. Hongyu Zhang, Dong Wang, Zhiqiang Wang, and Xi Zhang. Eur. Polym. J., 2007, 43, 2784-2791.

Direct measurements of the interaction between pyrene and graphite in aqueous media by single molecule force spectroscopy: Understanding the pi-pi interactions. Yiheng Zhang, Chuanjun Liu, Weiqing Shi, Zhiqiang Wang, Liming Dai and Xi Zhang. Langmuir, 2007, 23, 7911-7915.

Surface imprinting in layer-by-layer nanostructured films.Feng Shi, Zan Liu, Guanglu Wu, Meng Zhang, Huan Chen, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang .and Itamar WillnerAdv. Funct. Mater., 2007, 17, 1821-1827.

Reversible disulfide cross-linking in layer-by-layer films: Preassembly enhanced loading and pH/reductant dually controllable release.Jia Niu, Feng Shi, Zan Liu, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang.Langmuir, 2007, 23, 6377-6384.

Self-organization of polymerizable bolaamphiphiles bearing diacetylene mesogenic group. Shouchun Yin, Bo Song, Guanqing Liu, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang. Langmuir, 2007, 23, 5936-5941.

Photo-controlled reversible supramolecular assembly of an azobenzene-containing surfactant with α-cyclodextrin. Yapei Wang, Ning Ma, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang. Angew. Chem. Int. Ed., 2007, 46, 2823-2826.

Supramolecular nanofibers by self-organization of bolaamphiphiles through combination of hydrogen bonding and pi-pi stacking interaction. Bo Song, Hao Wei, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang.Adv. Mater., 2007, 19, 416-420.

Artificial nacre by alternating preparation of layer-by-layer polymer films and CaCO3 strata.Hao Wei, Ning Ma, Feng Shi, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang.Chem. Mater., 2007, 19, 1974-1978.

Azobenzene-containing supramolecular polymer films for laser-induced surface relief gratings. Jian Gao, Yaning He, Huaping Xu, Bo Song, Xi Zhang, Zhiqiang Wang and Xiaogong Wang. Chem. Mater., 2007, 19, 14-17.

To construct "ion traps" for enhancing the permselectivity and permeability of polyelectrolyte multilayer films. Huan Chen, Guanghong Zeng, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang. Macromolecules, 2007, 40, 653-660.

To adjust wetting properties of organic surface by in-situ photoreaction of aromatic azide.Feng Shi, Jia Niu, Zan Liu, Zhiqiang Wang, Mario Smet, Wim Dehaen, Yong Qiuand Xi Zhang.Langmuir, 2007, 23, 1253-1257.

The interaction between block copolymer micelles and azobenzene-containing surfactants: from co-assembly in water to layer-by-layer assembly at interface.Ning Ma, Yapei Wang, Baoyu Wang, Zhiqiang Wang, Xi Zhang, Guang Wang and Yue Zhao.Langmuir, 2007, 23, 2874-2878.

Self-organization of a UV-responsive PEG-terminated malachite green derivative: vesicle formation and photoinduced disassembly.Yugui Jiang, Yapei Wang, Ning Ma, Zhiqiang Wang, Mario Smet and Xi Zhang.Langmuir, 2007, 23, 4029-4034.

The unwinding of surfactant-induced helical structure of carboxymethyl amylose by single molecule force spectroscopy.Chuanjun Liu, Zhenhua Jiang, Zhiqiang Wang and Xi Zhang.Polymer, 2007, 48, 2030-2034.
